feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale westerlies gusting 120km/h in exposed places. Note: Another burst of strong winds is possible early Sunday morning. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale west to southwest winds gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Orange Warning has been decreased to Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: West to southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected above 700 metres today. 1 cm may accumulate about the summit at times.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected to affect the road above 800 metres today. 2 to 5 cm may accumulate about the summit and lesser amounts further down.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
